definition: variant of 一股腦兒|一股脑儿[yi1 gu3 nao3 r5]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: The bottom of the bucket is clean knocked cut.
sentences.chinese: 水桶底儿一古脑儿地都磕掉了。

sentences.english: I was In hIgh spIrIts. The fear and dIscomfort In whIch I had been lIvIng vanIshed entIrely.
sentences.chinese: 我非常兴奋，刚才的恐惧和不适一古脑儿都消失了。

sentences.english: He would have preferred to put her idea aside together, if he had known how.
sentences.chinese: 如果他已经知道情况，他宁愿把她一古脑儿抛到一边。

sentences.english: Existing economic system was taken over holus-bolus.
sentences.chinese: 现存的经济制度被一古脑儿全盘接收了过来。

definition: erhua variant of 一股腦|一股脑[yi1 gu3 nao3]
to cast or put aside/to forget for a while
to shake out/to bring to light/to squander
regardless of the consequences/recklessly relying on a hopelessly optimistic forecast
pinyin: bu4 guan3 san1 qi1 er4 shi2 yi1

definition: to pour beans out of a bamboo tube/to come clean/to make a clean breast of things
lit. count by fives and tens (idiom); to narrate systematically and in full detail
variant of 憤恨|愤恨[fen4 hen4]
